articles.content: Todays successful firing, needed for a short duration, has put Chandrayaan-3 into an orbit of 153 km x 163 km, as intended.

articles.author: Debra Werner
articles.title: SmallSat Alliance recognizes collegiate prize winners - SpaceNews
articles.description: First place went to a University of Texas team seeking to indirectly measure vegetation water content and predict nitrogen content.
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO The SmallSat Alliance celebrated the winners Aug. 15 of its first annual Collegiate Space Competition in Austin, Texas.

articles.title: Intel Regains On PCs, Loses In Servers Against AMD In CPU Market Share - CRN
articles.description: Intel regained a few points of CPU market share in PCs and lost a few points in servers against AMD in the second quarter, according to a new x86 CPU market report.
articles.content:
Components & Peripherals News
